issue.title: [Ruby] Add support for Ruby 2.3 again
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7959](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7959). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Ruby 2.3 reached EOL but Ubuntu 16.04 LTS ships Ruby 2.3. So supporting Ruby 2.3 again is valuable.

Note that Red Arrow 0.15.1 works with Ruby 2.3.
